title: Bentley University Special “Higher Ed and Career Preparedness”
itunes:title: Bentley University Special “Higher Ed and Career Preparedness”
description:
Carol is joined by Bentley President Gloria Larson to discuss how to prepare students for the new force. Susan Brennan, Associate VP of Career Services at Bentley, talks about how to provide students with the tools they need for meaningful careers and lives. David Lucey, VP of Talent Acquisition at Epsilon, discusses the importance of exposing students to work environments before graduation. Mary Ponziani, Bentley Class of 2018 Student, shares the view of the workplace for graduates. Bentley is a strategic partner of Bloomberg Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
